mapper.select: SELECT S.ranking AS RANKING, T.nombre AS TEAM_NAME, S.matches_played AS MATCHES_PLAYED, S.points AS POINTS, S.goals_for AS GOALS_FOR, S.goals_against AS GOALS_AGAINST, ( SELECT string_agg(result, '-' ORDER BY match_day DESC) FROM ( SELECT m.match_day, CASE WHEN m.local_team = T.id AND m.local_gol > m.away_gol THEN 'W' WHEN m.away_team = T.id AND m.away_gol > m.local_gol THEN 'W' WHEN m.local_gol = m.away_gol THEN 'D' ELSE 'L' END AS result FROM "match" m WHERE (m.local_team = T.id OR m.away_team = T.id) AND m.season_id = S.season_id AND m.status = 'Finalizado' AND m.MATCH_DAY <= S.journey_number ORDER BY m.match_day DESC LIMIT 5 ) last_matches ) AS LAST_RESULTS, (SELECT S1.RANKING FROM STANDING S1 WHERE S1.JOURNEY_NUMBER = #{journey}-1 AND S.season_id = #{seasonId} AND S1.TEAM_ID = T.ID) AS PREVIOUS FROM standing S JOIN team T ON S.team_id = T.id WHERE S.journey_number = #{journey} AND S.season_id = #{seasonId} ORDER BY S.ranking
